CustomField.description: UI Types: LightningChatter - it will show lightning chatter in both classic exp. and lightning exp ClassicChatter - it will show classic chatter in both classic exp. and lightning exp with lightningstylesheet Auto - it will dynamically change to classic chatter in class exp. and lightning chatter in lightning exp
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The UI to be used for chatter page. Eg:[LightningChatter,ClassicChatter,Auto]
CustomField.label: ChatterUI
